The online article baselessly claims tha: WHO) said healthy people do not have to wear masks outside hospitals.
The article includes an advisory from WH: issued in December, stating that masks alone are insufficient to prevent COVID-19 or spreading the virus.
Principia Scientific International: the website that published the article, is rated as a conspiracy and pseudoscience website that promotes misinformation.
WHO: s executive director, Dr. Michael Ryan, stated that there is no specific evidence to suggest that the wearing of masks by the mass population has any particular benefit and that there was a global shortage of masks, so front-line health care workers should be prioritized. However, WHO updated its guidance in June 2020 to include the general public wearing masks in situations where physical distancing is difficult.
